For over two decades, our family-run wholesale business has masterfully woven tradition and modernity into a seamless tapestry. We stand as an epitome of excellence, rooted in the timeless art of bandhani, yet constantly evolving to become leading wholesalers of diverse women's Indian wear apparel. Our journey, spanning more than 20 years, is driven by a deep commitment to celebrate the cultural richness of rajasthan. From the outset, we embarked on a mission to provide retailers across India with authentic, high-quality garments. Our foundation lies in preserving the intricate artistry of bandhani, a heritage that echoes through our collections. Through the years, we have meticulously upheld the essence of tradition while embracing the winds of change. As a family-run enterprise, our core values resonate with the spirit of rajasthan, where tradition is revered, and innovation is embraced. The intricate craftsmanship of bandhani remains at the heart of our offerings, symbolizing a connection to our roots. Simultaneously, our evolution into wholesalers of a diverse range of women's Indian wear apparel reflects our adaptability and commitment to meeting the dynamic demands of the market. Our unwavering dedication to excellence has established us as a reliable source for retailers seeking not only authentic craftsmanship but also a wide spectrum of choices in women's Indian wear. The seamless blend of tradition and modernity is evident in every piece we offer, showcasing the rich tapestry of India's cultural diversity. As we look towards the future, we remain steadfast in our commitment to delivering quality, authenticity, and a reflection of the evolving tastes in Indian fashion. Our journey is a testament to the harmonious coexistence of tradition and modernity, where the threads of the past weave seamlessly into the fabric of the future.

Good Business Lab (gbl) Is A Research And Labor Innovation Organization Seeking To Improve The Lives Of Millions Of Blue-collar Workers By Demonstrating The Business Case For Worker Wellbeing. At Gbl, Everything We Do Is Backed By Evidence. We Evaluate The Return On Investment (roi) Of Worker Wellbeing Programs Using Leading Economic Research Methods Such As Randomised Controlled Trials (rtcs). Thus, We Present An Undeniable Business Case For Investing In Programs That Not Only Benefit Low-income Workers’ Lives But Also Firm Productivity And The Bottom Line. gbl Works Across A Worker's Employment Journey, From Increasing Women In The Workforce To Closing The Skill Gap, Improving Job Quality, And Improving Health Conditions. Our Current Portfolio Of Projects Across Our Focus Areas Is Highlighted On Our Website, Https://www.goodbusinesslab.org/.

Ffbs-fashion For Biodiversity Solutions Presenting Ffbs-id Which Is A hybrid (nft+rfid) Digital Id Where The Journey Of Fashion Articles Can be Visualized From T1 To T5 And Its Impact On Environment & Biodiversity can Be Assessed In Realtime. Ffbs-id Is Blockchain-based, And traceability Is Extended To T5 With The Help Of Triangular Auditing. This can Help Brands In Measuring Their Actual Impact So That Steps Can Be taken To Meet Their Compliances And Other Sustainability Goals. ffbs-id Provides Biodiversity Assessment Of Each Fashion Article Which can Helps Brands In Understanding Their Commitment Or Roadmap To sustainable Development Goals (sdg) And Their Readiness For Eu action Plan For Circularity. Real Time Data For Co2 And Other Ghgs Can Be helpful In Measuring Their Esg Scores Which Is Going To Be Important In near Future.
